Package com.nmr.handler

Class PriceHandler

java.lang.Object
com.nmr.handler.PriceHandler
public class PriceHandler
extends java.lang.Object
PriceHandler contains all methods used to calculate prices shown on the contract and invoice page.

    • calculateCancellationPrice

      public static double calculateCancellationPrice​(boolean active, java.time.LocalDateTime rentalStartDate, double fullPrice)
      calculateCancellationFee() is calculating the discount the customer gets upon cancelling an order. In case of cancellation following charges become due: Up to 50 days prior to the start of the term of rental: 20% of the rental price, minimum 200â‚¬ Between 49 and 15 days prior to the start of the term of rental: 50% of the rental price Less than 15 days prior to the start of the term of rental: 80% of the rental price On the day of renting: 95% of the rental price This method will return the full price deducted by the fee.
      Parameters:
      active -
      rentalStartDate -
      fullPrice -
      Returns:

    • calculateCancellationFee

      public static double calculateCancellationFee​(boolean active, java.time.LocalDateTime rentalStartDate)
      calculateCancellationFee() is calculating the discount the customer gets upon cancelling an order. In case of cancellation following charges become due: Up to 50 days prior to the start of the term of rental: 20% of the rental price, minimum 200â‚¬ Between 49 and 15 days prior to the start of the term of rental: 50% of the rental price Less than 15 days prior to the start of the term of rental: 80% of the rental price On the day of renting: 95% of the rental price This method will return the discounted amount.
      Parameters:
      active -
      rentalStartDate -
      Returns:
